name: Sprawlopolis Score Tracker
description:
Sprawlopolis is a 1-4 player city building game from Button Shy Games. With 3 variable scoring goals, as well as road taxes and common block scoring, we've made Score Tracker for you to calculate, save, and share your scores. Choose your three cards and start the game. Come back and tally your score at the end.

-Easily tally your scores in all categories
-Save screenshots of your high scores to challenge yourself later
-Share your score board with friends
